name: Virtual Rubik's Cube (Georgy)
description:
This game is essentially a virtual adaptation of the Rubik's Cube. During the lock down, my parents had bought me a Rubik's Cube and I had a lot of fun learning how to solve it. This experience inspired me make this virtual version of a Rubik's Cube. 

Feel free to play it and leave your feedback in the comment section below. 

P.S. This game doesn't work on your phone.
